attributes.action: Completely overhaul the Mental Health Service urgently
attributes.additional_details: There is not enough support or emergency support available currently to those with serious mental health problems, experiencing psychosis or other "episode".  Only 2 options are available out of hours that mean a place at The Haven (of which in Hove we only have 4 places available) or a trip to A&E.  Sending a mental health patient to A&E whilst they are in crisis is not an acceptable option.  Waiting 4 - 6 hours in a heightened state to see a Mental Health Worker is unacceptable.
attributes.background: Conduct an urgent & complete overhaul of the Mental Health Service in the UK - it currently does not provide adequate support for Mental Health patients in crisis due to serious underfunding and understaffing - this needs to be addressed as a matter of urgency.

rejection.details:
We're not exactly sure how you'd like things to change, but we think this petition may be similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600251
